channel.title: Little Baby - Fly Free
channel.description:
Woah! A new song? I haven't posted in almost a month! Well, here you go --> [Fly Free](https://soundcloud.com/littlebabu/fly-free), give it a listen and tell me what you think!
Thanks! - Little Baby

item.title: Little Baby - Fly Free

item.description:
Can’t mess up my 1:1 like ratio haha
P.s. Thanks on the birthday wish

item.title: Little Baby - Fly Free
item.dc:creator: Little_Baby
item.description:
Thanks! (And Happy Birthday!) I just finished it and forgot to listen to it when I was done because my SoundCloud was so inactive from when I was making the album, so I just built it off of a unfinished project.

spoiler

Read full topic

item.title: Little Baby - Fly Free
item.dc:creator: Bassment_Chemists
item.description:
Wow! I love the melody, and flute sound at the beginning… Wow and then the beat dropping in great stuff. At 56 seconds I’m not a fan of the little wahwhadawhawhawha thing it never makes an appearance again and there for is erroneous.
Like the slow build with the claps. And then kick drum change at like 1:55 and the back and forth between the kick and clap gets me to wanting to step. Cool track kid.

P.s. Would you build me a 4 bar chord melody. I’m using decruzs ultraviolet chords right now as a place holder in my track I’m currently working on.
Hope the input helps

Read full topic
